text: Death Before Dishonour is the fifth studio album by Scottish punk rock band, The Exploited. Death Before Dishonour was released on April 15, 1987. The album was re-released on June 19, 2001. The single "Sexual Favours" had a music video released for it. The album was ranked in the top 200 of the Britain Alternative Music list. The re-release of the album featured seven more tracks. ==Songs== ;Re-release bonus tracks ==References== Category:1987 albums Category:The Exploited albums Category:Punk albums
title: Death Before Dishonour
